# My Affilate List

Creates a custom post type to hold affiliate links and list them on a single web page.

**Contributors:** [topher1kenobe](http://profiles.wordpress.org/topher1kenobe)  
**Tags:** [](http://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/)  
**Requires at least:** 5.5  
**Tested up to:** 5.5  
**Stable tag:** 1.0  
**License:** [GPLv2 or later](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html)  

## Description ##

Creates a custom post type to hold affiliate links and list them on a single web page.

## Installation ##

This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

1. Upload the `my-affiliate-list` folder to the `/wp-content/plugins/` directory
1. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress
1. Create new or Edit a Post.
